document_data.name: Lilac Rattleflutz
document_data.mainbody: '''Lilac Rattleflutz''' was a member of a cell of the [[Cult of Reborn Flame]] that operated out of [[Tarmalune]] in [[1480 DR]].
document_data.Description: Lilac was a [[gnome]] female who liked to dress in purple clothes.
document_data.History: In 1480 DR, Lilac was a member of a cell of the Cult of Reborn Flame operating out of Tarmalune. Her job was to awaken the [[primordial]] [[Achazar]]. Lilac was eventually killed by a group of [[adventurer]]s sent by [[Halagothra|Halagothra the Healer]] to stop the cult.
